item.title: Most Young Children With Probable Autism Not Referred
item.description: A scoping review has found wide variance in overall rates of primary care referral for specialized evaluation and intervention. Medscape Medical News

item.title: When the Doctor Needs a Checkup
item.description: Researchers have documented a gradual decline in physicians’ cognitive abilities starting in their mid-sixties. KFF Health News
